name: comicopds
description: ComicOPDS is a self-hosted OPDS server tailored for comic book libraries. It allows browsing and serving comic book files through OPDS-compatible readers and apps using a streamlined web back end.

features.title: Opds Server
features.description: Standard protocol for comic book distribution. Compatible with all major readers

features.title: Comic Library Management
features.description: Organize and serve your comic collection efficiently. Streamlined browsing experience

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Simple administration through web interface. Easy configuration and management

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your comic library. Privacy-focused solution

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource requirements for smooth operation. Perfect for home servers
